entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is angry and upset.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards that escaped.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who is irritated by the singing.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard and the main antagonist in the story.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is mentioned as being present.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is mentioned as giving him a telling-off.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather who he wishes to talk to about his dream.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts who might get sacked.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the escaped Death Eaters.
Gryffindor and Hufflepuff are competing against each other in a match.
Slytherins are teasing Gryffindor about their performance.
Filch is irritated by the singing of Slytherins.
Harry is afraid of Voldemort and has a dream about him.
Harry wishes to talk to Sirius about his dream.
Hagrid is a concern for Harry, who fears he might get sacked.
